Startgrid | Burlingame | Denver | REMOTE

Sr. Software Engineer & DevOps Engineer

Startgrid is a well funded startup based in California. We are building a robust platform to build & manage Innovation Networks. Our clients are Enterprise F500 companies.

Open positions include Sr Software Engineer for Data Services (GoLang, MongoDB, JSON) and a DevOps Engineer (AWS, Ansible)

We have a small but talented fully remote team with a great working dynamic. If you’re passionate about startups, entrepreneurship, and building really awesome technology, we’d love to hear from you!

This position is open to US residents who are legally authorized to work in the US. Flexible schedule around 9a-5p California working hours. Some travel may be required.

If you’re interested and think you’re a good fit, please shoot us an email at engrjobs@startgrid.com and let us know a bit about you and what you’re looking for.
